projects.name: Pharaoh Sun
projects.about: Pharaoh Sun was the first title I worked on at AGS. The basegame is a standard 3x5 reel configuration with bonus symbols that award freespins and a wild symbol that randomly awards progressives. The glyphs on the sandstone columns have a chance to light up when the wild symbol lands on the reels. The freespins allow the player to select alternative reel configurations like 4x5 or 5x5.

projects.name: Wild Tiki
projects.about: Wild Tiki was the second title I worked on at AGS. The basegame is a standard 3x5 reel configuration with a bonus drum symbol that awards 8 freespins and a wild tiki symbol that awards progressives. The tiki torches have a chance to light when a wild symbol lands on the reels. In the freespins, wild symbols expand vertically, horizontally, or both simultaneously to fill the middle 9 symbol stops.

projects.name: Dragon Blast
projects.about: Dragon Blast was the third title I worked on at AGS. The basegame is a standard 3x5 reel configuration with a random chance to expand up to a 6x5 configuration. The freespins can expand up to a 7x5 configuration.

projects.name: Freedom 7
projects.about: Freedom 7s was the fourth title I worked on at AGS. The basegame is a standard 3x5 reel configuration with a bonus symbol that awards 8 freespins and a 'QuickScore' symbol that awards varying tiers of progressive wins. In the freespins, some symbols land and reveal to be an H1 - H4 or 'QuickScore' symbol.

projects.name: 8 Riches
projects.about: 8 Riches was the fifth title I worked on at AGS. The basegame is a standard 3x5 reel configuration with a bonus symbol that awards 8 freespins and a 'QuickScore' symbol that awards varying tiers of progressive wins. In the freespins, some symbols land and reveal to be an H1 - H4 or 'QuickScore' symbol.

projects.name: Shining Dragon
projects.about: Shining Dragon was the sixth title I worked on at AGS. The basegame is a standard 3x5 reel configuration with a bonus symbol that awards a freespin pick game and a wild symbol that awards a progressive pick game. The freespin pick game lets players choose between additional wild symbols or additional H1 symbols in the freespin games. The progressive pick game lets players choose between 5 firecrackers that reveal an award.

projects.name: Burning Tiger
projects.about: Burning Tiger was the seventh title I worked on at AGS. The basegame is a standard 3x5 reel configuration with a bonus symbol that awards a freespin pick game and a wild symbol that awards a progressive pick game. The freespin pick game lets players choose between additional wild symbols or additional H1 symbols in the freespin games. The progressive pick game lets players choose between 5 firecrackers that reveal an award.

projects.name: Bao Bei Cash
projects.about: Bao Bei Cash was the eighth title I worked on at AGS. The basegame is a standard 3x5 reel configuration with a bonus symbol that awards a freespin pick game. In the freespin pick game, players can choose between additional wild stacks or additional H1 symbols. In both the basegame and freespin games, golden wild stacks can land sequentially and award the player with a progressive depending on the number of full stacks won.

projects.name: Temple Cash
projects.about: Temple Cash was the ninth title I worked on at AGS. The basegame is a standard 3x5 reel configuration with a bonus symbol that awards a freespin pick game. In the freespin pick game, players can choose between additional wild stacks or additional H1 symbols. In both the basegame and freespin games, golden wild stacks can land sequentially and award the player with a progressive depending on the number of full stacks won.

name: Personal
about: This is a collection of interesting projects and designs that I've made in my personal time, ocassionally alongside friends.

projects.name: Project Loki
projects.about: Project Loki was a simple Unity 3D game I worked on with a friend. We ported it over to GitHub after working with Unity Collab. Player's are launched into a randomly generated map with small red pads that bounce the player forward. Touching the ground resets the player to the beginning.
